title: DevOps Manager
description: Leading DevOps transformation initiatives, implementing CI/CD with Jenkins, managing AWS infrastructure, and orchestrating applications with Docker. Driving automation strategies and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

title: Data & DevOps Lead
description: Leading and coordinating a team of 6-10 people. Design of data architectures oriented to CI/CD processes for financial pipelines. Development of automated processes for deploying analysis systems, dashboards, and reporting.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Automation of data pipelines for ML models with Apache Spark on Hadoop. Implementation of monitoring and alerts to ensure availability and reliability. Automated validation and quality control before model training.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Design and development of modern web applications using React and Astro. Implementation of REST and GraphQL APIs. Deployment on Vercel, Netlify, and self-hosted servers. CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions.

title: Data DevOps Engineer
description: Development of ETL pipelines for banking data ingestion and transformation. Continuous validation and monitoring scripts to ensure integrity and consistency. Regulatory compliance through automated audits.

title: Junior Engineer
description: Optimization and validation of data quality in databases for pharmaceutical and public sector clients. Design and proposal of optimal data structures and visualization through templates.
